tables.name: dydx_aux_accounting_view
tables.description: This table provides auxiliary accounting information for decentralized finance (DeFi) services in the Cosmos ecosystem. It summarizes key metrics for each account.

columns.name: labels
columns.description: Identifying hash or unique reference string for each transaction or event

columns.name: category
columns.description: Classification of transaction type (e.g., transfer, governance, staking)

columns.name: amount
columns.description: Value or quantity transferred or modified within a transaction

tables.name: dydx_balance_module_account
tables.description: This table displays a daily record of account balances in the Cosmos ecosystem, pulled from blockchain data. It provides a snapshot of assets held by specific addresses at different points in time.

columns.name: day
columns.description: YYYY-MM-DD date of transaction occurrence

columns.name: address
columns.description: Globally unique identifier of Cosmos blockchain account

columns.name: denom
columns.description: Standardized unit denomination within Cosmos blockchain network

columns.name: amount
columns.description: Quantity of denominated assets held or transferred in a transaction

tables.name: dydx_block_events
tables.description: Information on key events occurring within the Cosmos ecosystem. This table captures crucial blockchain data, providing a chronological view of events unfolding across the network.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Sequence number of the block in the blockchain.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the block was mined or created.

columns.name: event_index
columns.description: Ordinal position of the event within the block.

columns.name: event_type
columns.description: Type of event occurring within the blockchain.

columns.name: event_attributes
columns.description: Additional attributes associated with the event.

columns.name: source
columns.description: Blockchain or network source of the block event data.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the data was ingested into the dataset.

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: Current schema version of the dataset.

tables.name: dydx_blocks
tables.description: This table contains details of blocks from the Cosmos ecosystem, providing insights into the blockchain's growth and transaction volume over time. The data is sourced from various Cosmos-based blockchains, offering a comprehensive view of the network's performance.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Sequential identifier for each block in the blockchain.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Unix timestamp representing when the block was created.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the cosmos blockchain network.

columns.name: proposer_address
columns.description: Address of the node that proposed the block.

columns.name: validators_hash
columns.description: Hashed list of validators associated with the block.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Unix timestamp when the block data was ingested.

columns.name: messages_bytes
columns.description: Total size of all messages processed by the block.

columns.name: tx_count
columns.description: Count of transactions included within a block.

tables.name: dydx_cancel_order
tables.description: This table contains information about cancelled orders on the DYDX exchange, powered by the Cosmos ecosystem. It showcases the cancellations of orders across various markets.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Block number indicating sequence of validated transactions in the blockchain

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp of block creation within the blockchain network

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: Unique identifier for a transaction within the blockchain

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: Index position of the transaction within the block

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: Index position of the message within the transaction

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: Index position of the action within the message

columns.name: sender
columns.description: Public address or account executing the transaction or action

columns.name: subaccount
columns.description: Sub-account associated with the sender for fiscal organization

columns.name: order_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the trade order being cancelled

columns.name: market_id
columns.description: Identifier for the market or pair being traded in

columns.name: type
columns.description: Type of transaction or action being executed

columns.name: expiration_timestamp
columns.description: Scheduled expiration time for the trade order

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Time at which the data was ingested into the database

tables.name: dydx_delegate
tables.description: dydx_delegator activity within the Cosmos ecosystem, providing insight into trade, transfer, and token denomination actions occurring across various validator nodes.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Height of the block in the Cosmos blockchain network

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp of the block occurrence in the Cosmos blockchain network

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: Unique identifier for a transaction executed on the Cosmos network

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: Index of the transaction within a block on the Cosmos network

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: Index of the message within a transaction on the Cosmos network

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: Index of the action within a message on the Cosmos network

columns.name: sender
columns.description: Address of the entity executing a transaction in the Cosmos network

columns.name: validator
columns.description: Address of the Cosmos validator associated with a transaction

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: Amount of token transferred or staked in the Cosmos network

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: Denomination of the token transferred or staked in the Cosmos network

columns.name: new_shares
columns.description: Updated share amount of a validator after a delegation event

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the data was ingested into the processing system

tables.name: dydx_deposit
tables.description: This table represents deposits on the Cosmos blockchain ecosystem, detailing transactions where assets have been moved from one account to another. It provides a comprehensive view of deposit-related activities across various blockchains.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The total number of blocks in the blockchain at the time of the transaction

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp representing the date and time the block was created on the chain

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: Cryptographic hash uniquely identifying a transaction on the blockchain

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: Index of the transaction within the block

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: Index of the message within the transaction

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: Index of the action within the message

columns.name: sender
columns.description: Address of the sender involved in the blockchain transaction

columns.name: recipient
columns.description: Address of the recipient involved in the blockchain transaction

columns.name: recipient_subaccount
columns.description: Subaccount information associated with the recipient's address

columns.name: quantums
columns.description: Units of the token being transferred during the blockchain transaction

columns.name: asset_id
columns.description: Unique identifier of the token being transferred during the transaction

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp representing when the data was ingested into the database

tables.name: dydx_match
tables.description: This table contains match data from the Decentralized Exchange (DXD) on the Cosmos ecosystem, where orders are matched and trades occur. It provides insights into the market activity and order execution on the DXD.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Incrementing identifier for the block in which the transaction was included

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the matching transaction occurred on the blockchain

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: Unique identifier for the transaction on the blockchain

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: Index of the transaction within its block

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: Index of the transaction's message in its block

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: Index of the transaction's action within its message

columns.name: taker
columns.description: Address of the taker in the matching marketplace transaction

columns.name: taker_subaccount
columns.description: Subaccount identifier for the taker's marketplace account

columns.name: taker_order_id
columns.description: Identifier for the taker's matching marketplace order

columns.name: maker
columns.description: Address of the maker in the matching marketplace transaction

columns.name: maker_subaccount
columns.description: Subaccount identifier for the maker's marketplace account

columns.name: maker_order_id
columns.description: Identifier for the maker's matching marketplace order

columns.name: taker_order_fee_quote_quantums
columns.description: Taker side marketplace order fees denominated in quote assets

columns.name: maker_order_fee_quote_quantums
columns.description: Maker side marketplace order fees denominated in quote assets

columns.name: maker_quote_balance_delta_quote_quantums
columns.description: Delta change in maker's main quote balance

columns.name: taker_quote_balance_delta_quote_quantums
columns.description: Delta change in taker's main quote balance

columns.name: maker_perpetual_quantums_delta_base_quantums
columns.description: Delta change in maker's perpetual contract balance in base assets

columns.name: taker_perpetual_quantums_delta_base_quantums
columns.description: Delta change in taker's perpetual contract balance in base assets

columns.name: insurance_fund_delta_quote_quantums
columns.description: Delta change in insurance fund balance, denominated in quote assets

columns.name: is_liquidation
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating if the matching transaction was a liquidation

columns.name: is_deleverage
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating if the matching transaction was a deleverage event

columns.name: perpetual_id
columns.description: Identifier for the perpetual contract involved in the matching transaction

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the data was ingested into the database

tables.name: dydx_megavault_historic_snapshots
tables.description: This table contains snapshots of historical assets held in the DyDX Megavault. The data scopes the Cosmos ecosystem blockchain and provides information on daily balances of assets.

columns.name: day
columns.description: Unix timestamp representing the day of blockchain data harvest

columns.name: address
columns.description: Public address for entities interacting within the blockchain ecosystem

columns.name: shares
columns.description: Fractional ownership stake in a decentralized vault

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: Quantity of tokens associated with a specific vault share

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: Standard unit of token representation within the Cosmos ecosystem

tables.name: dydx_mempool_transactions
tables.description: This table provides real-time information on pending transactions in the Cosmos ecosystem, specifically community-driven exchanges. It allows users to monitor and analyze on-chain activity without needing to wait for block confirmations.

columns.name: attributes
columns.description: Enumerated values of transaction statuses, error codes, or other metadata

columns.name: publish_time
columns.description: Unix timestamp of the transaction's publish time in the mempool

columns.name: message_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for a transaction or message

columns.name: subscription_name
columns.description: Name of the subscription or channel for IBC data

columns.name: data
columns.description: Transaction payload, event data, or smart contract output

tables.name: dydx_message_events
tables.description: This table provides a stream of events from blockchains within the Cosmos ecosystem, offering insights into the transactional activity at specific block timestamps. It serves as a critical component for understanding the dynamics of the ecosystem.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Sequence number of a block in blockchain ledger

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp of block creation in the blockchain network

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: Unique hash identifier of a transaction in the blockchain

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: Index of a transaction in a block within the blockchain

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: Index of a message within a transaction in the blockchain

columns.name: event_index
columns.description: Index of an event within a message in the blockchain

columns.name: event_type
columns.description: Category of event occurrence in the blockchain transaction

columns.name: event_attributes
columns.description: Detailed attributes of a specific event in the blockchain

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the data was ingested into the system

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: Version of the data schema at the time of ingestion

tables.name: dydx_message_senders
tables.description: This table contains information about the senders of messages in the Cosmos ecosystem, extracted from blockchain data. It captures essential details about the message sending transactions, including the sender and action performed.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The sequential identifier for a unique block within the blockchain.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when a block was produced within the blockchain network.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: Unique cryptographic identifier for a transaction within the blockchain network.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: Sequential identifier for a transaction within a block within the blockchain network.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: Sequential identifier for messages within a transaction within the blockchain network.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: Sequential identifier for actions within a message within the blockchain network.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: Address that initiated a transaction or action within the blockchain network.

columns.name: action
columns.description: Note describing an action taken by a sender within the blockchain network.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the data was ingested into the dataset for analysis.

tables.name: dydx_message_types_transactions
tables.description: This table contains transaction messages from the Cosmos ecosystem, providing insights into the blockchain activity. It includes metadata such as block height, timestamp, and sender information.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Height of the block containing the transaction or governance event

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp of the block containing the transaction or governance event

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: Unique identifier of the transaction on the blockchain network

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: Index of the transaction within the block containing it

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: Index of the message within the transaction

columns.name: event_index
columns.description: Index of the event within the message or transaction

columns.name: sender
columns.description: Address of the account that initiated the transaction or governance interaction

columns.name: message_type
columns.description: Type of message or event within the transaction or governance context

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the data was ingested into the database

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Blockchain block height, sequential incremental identifier

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp of when blockchain block was created and validated

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: Hash, or unique identifier of the blockchain transaction

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: Sequential index of transactions in a block

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: Index of message within a transaction

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: Index of action or instruction within a message

columns.name: sender
columns.description: Address of the user initiating the transaction or action

columns.name: subaccount
columns.description: Account or asset wrapper within a multi-asset address

columns.name: order_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for a dydx order

columns.name: quantums
columns.description: Amount of quantized asset, larger denomination value

columns.name: subticks
columns.description: Smaller denomination value of quantized asset, beyond quanta

columns.name: market_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for a dydx market pair

columns.name: direction
columns.description: Direction of trade or order execution, e.g., buy, sell

columns.name: type
columns.description: Type of order, such as limit or market order

columns.name: trigger_condition
columns.description: Condition under which an order is triggered

columns.name: trigger_subticks
columns.description: Trigger condition sub-tick value, when sub-tick threshold

columns.name: memo
columns.description: Optional field with additional transaction information

columns.name: reduce_only
columns.description: Flag indicating whether order reduces position size

columns.name: expiration_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp of when an order expires or becomes invalid

columns.name: on_expiration
columns.description: Behavior when an order expires, e.g., cancel or expire

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the data was ingested into the database

tables.name: dydx_price
tables.description: This dataset from the Cosmos ecosystem provides minute-level price data for DYDX token in USDC, offering insights into the token's volatility and trading activity. It serves as a resource for analyzing market trends and behavior within the cryptocurrency space.

columns.name: minute
columns.description: Representing time interval of 1 minute in UTC

columns.name: price_in_usdc
columns.description: Spot price of token in USD Coin (USDC) cryptocurrency

tables.name: dydx_settled_funding
tables.description: This table contains data on the settled funding for perpetual contracts on DyDx, providing insights into the financial balance of these contracts within the Cosmos ecosystem.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Highest blockchain block number at the time of transaction inclusion

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp of the blockchain block containing this transaction

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: Cryptographic hash of the transaction that settled funding

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: Transaction index within the block containing this TX hash

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: Message index within the交易 represented by this TX hash

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: Index of the action within the message that settled funding

columns.name: subaccount
columns.description: Temporary or participant-based sub-accounts within DyDx settlements

columns.name: subaccount_number
columns.description: Unique identifier for subaccounts within DyDx settlements

columns.name: funding_paid_quote_quantums
columns.description: Quote quantums for funding paid to/from participants

columns.name: perpetual_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for perpetual contracts participating in settlements

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the data was ingested into the analysis system

tables.name: dydx_state
tables.description: dydx_state table contains historical and current state of Derivatives Exchange (dYdX) on the Cosmos ecosystem blockchains. It allows users to analyze the exchange's operations and trends over time.

columns.name: type
columns.description: Blockchain event or transaction type (e.g., transfer, governance vote)

columns.name: block
columns.description: Height of the block containing the corresponding event or transaction

columns.name: block_time
columns.description: Timestamp of when the containing block was proposed to the network

columns.name: deleted
columns.description: Indicates whether the record has been deleted from the state

columns.name: val
columns.description: Variable or value associated with the corresponding event or transaction

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the data was ingested into the database

tables.name: dydx_transactions
tables.description: This table contains transactions data from the Cosmos ecosystem, providing insights into on-chain activity and interactions across various blockchain networks.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Blockchain block number indicating current ledger position

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for a blockchain network within the Cosmos ecosystem

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: Unique transaction identifier across blockchain network

columns.name: tx_info
columns.description: Bundled transaction metadata from the transaction softmax counter

columns.name: tx_log_message
columns.description: Sequence of events occurring during transaction execution

columns.name: memo
columns.description: Free-text annotation added to a transaction for informational purposes

columns.name: fee
columns.description: Transaction fee denominated in native blockchain currency units

columns.name: tx_code
columns.description: Integer status code representing transaction outcome

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: Index of transactions executed within a valid block

columns.name: gas_used
columns.description: Measures gas consumed by execution of smart contracts and transactions

columns.name: gas_wanted
columns.description: Measures gas requested for execution of smart contracts and transactions

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp denoting when data was ingested into the system

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: Identifier for the version of the schema used for JSON data

columns.name: fee_coins
columns.description: Denomination of transaction fee in native blockchain currency

columns.name: fee_granter
columns.description: Address of account granting transaction fee to other account

columns.name: fee_payer
columns.description: Address of account responsible for transaction fee payment

columns.name: gas_limit
columns.description: Maximum gas units that can be expended within a transaction

columns.name: single_sign_mode
columns.description: Indicates whether transaction was signed with ECDSA.Keyring

columns.name: multi_sign_json
columns.description: Base64 encoded JSON signature of multi-sig transactions

columns.name: timeout_height
columns.description: Expected block height if an arbitrary transaction were not executed

tables.name: dydx_transfer
tables.description: This table provides a comprehensive overview of transfers made within the Cosmos ecosystem. It logs all senders, recipients, asset types, and transfer amounts.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Total number of blocks in the blockchain at this point in time (height)

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp of when block was proposed to the blockchain network

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: Unique hexadecimal identifier for a transaction on the blockchain

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: Index of this transaction within a block (sequence number)

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: Sequence number of IBC message within a packet (cross-chain transfer)

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: Index of an operation within a message or transaction (step number)

columns.name: sender
columns.description: Public address of the sending entity (user, contract, etc.)

columns.name: sender_subaccount
columns.description: Sub-address or sub-account of the sender

columns.name: recipient
columns.description: Public address of the receiving entity (user, contract, etc.)

columns.name: recipient_subaccount
columns.description: Sub-address or sub-account of the recipient

columns.name: quantums
columns.description: Exchange rate between assets, often denoted in base units (ISO 4217)

columns.name: asset_id
columns.description: Identifier for the asset being transferred (token, coin, etc.)

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp at which data was ingested into the dataset

tables.name: dydx_tx_messages
tables.description: This table contains a detailed history of transactions (txs) on Cosmos-based blockchains, providing insight into the network activity. It captures various aspects of each transaction, including the message type, content, and timing.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Sequential block count within the blockchain network.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: Unique identifier of the blockchain network or hub.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for a blockchain transaction.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: Index of the transaction within a given block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: Index of the message within a given transaction.

columns.name: message_type
columns.description: Category or classification of the transaction message.

columns.name: message
columns.description: Transaction message payload or data representation.

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: Schema version used to encode the transaction message.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the transaction data was ingested.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the block containing the transaction was created.

tables.name: dydx_undelegate
tables.description: This table contains records of token undelegations executed on the Cosmos network, providing insights into validator stakes and decentralization of the network.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Block number representing the position in the blockchain sequence

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the block containing the transaction was mined

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: Deduplicated hash identifying a unique transaction in the blockchain

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: Index of the transaction within its parent block

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: Index of the associated message within the transaction

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: Index of the associated action within the message

columns.name: sender
columns.description: Public key or address of the sender initiating the transaction

columns.name: validator
columns.description: Public key or address of the validator involved in the transaction

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: Amount of tokens associated with the transaction

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: Denomination of the token involved in the transaction

columns.name: completion_time
columns.description: Timestamp of transaction finalization or completion

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the transaction data was ingested

tables.name: dydx_validators
tables.description: This table contains validator information from the Cosmos ecosystem. It provides details about the validators, including their operator and account information, commission rates, and more.

columns.name: operator_address
columns.description: Address responsible for operating the validator

columns.name: account_address
columns.description: Ethereum account associated with the validator

columns.name: consensus_pubkey
columns.description: Public validator key used in Cosmos consensus protocol

columns.name: jailed
columns.description: Flag indicating if validator is currently jailed (penalized)

columns.name: status
columns.description: Validator status (e.g. Bonded, Unbonding, Unbonded)

columns.name: tokens
columns.description: Validator's staking tokens (Cosmos SDK denomination)

columns.name: moniker
columns.description: Validator's display name/metadata

columns.name: identity
columns.description: Validator's self-identified metadata

columns.name: website
columns.description: Validator's website or additional contact information

columns.name: security_contact
columns.description: Validator's point of contact for security concerns

columns.name: details
columns.description: Additional validator information, typically metadata

columns.name: unbonding_height
columns.description: Height at which unbonding is triggered

columns.name: unbonding_time
columns.description: Time at which unbonding is triggered

columns.name: commission_rate
columns.description: Validator's commission rate ( fee percentage)

columns.name: commission_max_rate
columns.description: Validator's maximum commission rate (fee ceiling)

columns.name: commission_max_change_rate
columns.description: Validator's maximum commission rate change per period

columns.name: commission_update_time
columns.description: Time when commission rate last updated

columns.name: min_self_delegation
columns.description: Minimum self-delegation threshold for validator

columns.name: snapshot_height
columns.description: Height at which data snapshot was taken

columns.name: snapshot_time
columns.description: Time at which data snapshot was taken

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Time when data was ingested into the dataset

tables.name: dydx_vaults_last_snapshot
tables.description: The dydx_vaults_last_snapshot table contains the most recent snapshot of decentralized exchange (DEX) vaults from the Cosmos ecosystem, providing insights into the digital asset holdings and ownership structures of various vaults.

columns.name: subaccount_number
columns.description: Unique identifier for the subaccount associated with the vault

columns.name: vault_params
columns.description: Serialized parameters for the vault's configuration and settings

tables.name: dydx_vote

tables.name: dydx_withdrawal
